mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM PRCS
AND PRCS_NM LIKE '%' || #{prcsNm} || '%'
order by PRCS_CD asc
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'pr'|| LPAD(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PRCS_CD, -3))) +1, 3, 0) AS PRCS_CD FROM PRCS_CD
INSERT INTO PRCS(PRCS_CD, PRCS_FG, PRCS_NM, PRCS_DESCT, PRCS_UNIT, PROD_PD) VALUES (#{prcsCd}, #{prcsFg}, #{prcsNm}, #{prcsDesct}, #{prcsUnit}, #{prodPd})
